snippet: The authorities planned to arrest 460 people in the killings, which began when the couple were accused of blasphemy by burning the Quran.
abstract: Enraged mob in Punjab Province, Pakistan, tortures and kills Pakistani Christian couple Shahzad Masih and Shama Masih, incinerating their bodies in a brick kiln; authorities plan to arrest 460 people in the killings, which began when the couple were accused of blasphemy by burning the Quran.

byline.contributor: Salman Masood contributed reporting from Islamabad, Pakistan.

lead_paragraph: The authorities planned to arrest 460 people in the killings, which began when the couple were accused of blasphemy by burning the Quran.

headline.main: Pakistani Christian Couple Are Tortured and Burned to Death by Angry Mob
headline.print_headline: Pakistani Christian Couple Is Tortured and Burned to Death by Angry Mob
